posts.content:
What's up with the voting? These two drop dead gorgeous jawdrappin' buses in my humble opinion should have run neck and neck. Then along comes my doublecab & I get ten votes...hey thanks much for the Stateside newbie kudos; I am honoured. I entered it on a mere whim just for the adventure. Actually, I've yet to do anything to it--I've had it for some ten weeks now & the plan is to deal with the rust spots especially in the bed and around the hinges, and to close a couple little holes...plus some upholstery work and getting the radio to work once again.

Thanks again.
